availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: George C. Hallet (Fulton Co soldier, attorney, county attorney, and city judge)

body.p: Kentucky soldier and attorney. Served as colonel of the Fortieth Regiment Kentucky Militia of Fulton County, Kentucky in 1863. Served as city judge of Hickman, Kentucky in 1863. Served as county attorney of Fulton County, Kentucky in 1863.

bibl.p: The War of the Rebellion: A Compilation of the Official Records of the Union and Confederate Armies (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1889) Series I, Vol XXIII, Part I, 825-826.
